verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Am
“Fear not, for I am with you,
Fmaj7
Fear not, for I am with you;
Dm7
Fear not, for I am with you,”
Am G/A
Says the Lord.
Am
“Fear not, for I am with you,
Fmaj7
Fear not, for I am with you;
Dm7
Fear not, for I am with you,”
Am F/G
Says the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
C G2/B
I have redeemed you, I have called you by name –
F/A C/G
Child, you are Mine;
C G2/B
When you walk through the water, I will be there,
F/A C/G
And through the flame.
E7 Am Em7
You'll not (No Way!) be drowned!
Am Em7
You'll not (No Way!) be burned!
F G C
For I am with you.
